title: TextUtils
description: This project was created to learn React and provides functionality for performing various text manipulation operations on user input.

title: NewsApp
description: This project is built with React to integrate a News API, enabling the app to fetch data from an external source and display it dynamically.

title: Employee Management System
description: Employee Management System is a web application designed to manage employees and their associated departments. It implements CRUD operations with Spring Boot on the backend, while the frontend is built using React.
